Text: Re OTCBB INVESTMENT PROFILE DPRIDiversified Product Inspections Inc OTCBBDPRI MAJOR CONTRACT ANNOUNCEMENTS AND HUGE NEWSLETTER COVERAGE THIS WEEK FORDPRI This Thursday DPRI will be profiled by some major newsletters along withthe release of significant news regarding explosive sales for the Company There will be huge volume and a strong increase in price for severaldays The same newsletters that profiled MSTR will begin coverage onDPRI They brought MSTR from to in days We know forcertain that the same groups are going to profile DPRI starting on Thursday We are very proud that we can share this information with you so thatyou can make a profit out of it It is highly advisable to take a positionin DPRI as soon as possible today before the market closes or tomorrow Revenues for DPRI a year old fullyreporting company have skyrocketed higher this year to over Million on substantial contracts fromtheir Fortune client base The stock has already bounced sharply from its week low and will continuemoving up immediately We believe the stock could easily reach inless than a month Good luck and watch DPRI fly this week
